HPI 8052 Lancia Delta S4 1986 Rallye Sanremo 2nd Place D. Cerrato/G. Cerri





The 1986 Rallye Sanremo was the 5th and final round of the Italian Rally Championship. With the controversial second place finish after Peugeot’s disqualification, Cerrato & Cerri secured the championship. While the FIA did annul the results of the rally for the WRC, it’s not clear if the results were annulled for the Italian Rally Championship.
